employee_external_id.notes: HiBob uses employee ID in path parameter. Map path parameter 'id' to Flip's employee_external_id for API calls

absence_type_external_id.notes: HiBob policyType maps to Flip absence_type_external_id. Both represent the type/category of time off

status.notes: Both APIs use 'status' field to indicate request state. May need enum value mapping between systems

start_date.notes: Direct date field mapping. HiBob uses date format, Flip expects YYYY-MM-DD string

end_date.notes: Direct date field mapping. HiBob uses date format, Flip expects YYYY-MM-DD string

start_half_day.notes: Convert HiBob enum (all_day/morning/afternoon) to boolean. morning=false, afternoon=true, all_day=false

end_half_day.notes: Convert HiBob enum (all_day/morning/afternoon) to boolean. morning=false, afternoon=true, all_day=false

amount.notes: Use HiBob 'days' field as amount. For hour-based requests, convert hours to days using business rules

unit.notes: Determine unit based on HiBob request type. If 'days' field used → 'DAYS', if 'hours' field used → 'HOURS'

processing_context: HiBob Time Off API → Flip HRIS Absence Management API mapping analysis. HiBob uses employee ID in path parameter and supports both days/hours for time off requests.
mapping_complexity: Medium - requires enum conversions for half-day logic and unit determination logic
